  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Referee
    getReferee(Connection connection)
    Retrieves the referee from the database that is associated with the instance of the referee using the user id of the account and returns the referee.
    MatchEvent
    matchEventDialog(JfgpWindow frame, Match match)
    Generates the dialog box to add the details of the match event and returns the instance of match event that has been created using the dialog box.
    Match
    matchToResult(Connection connection, Match match, int homeScore, int awayScore)
    Updates information in the matches table so that the match can be recognised as a result rather than a fixture, as well as automatically deciding the outcome of the match using the score.

  • Constructor Details

    • RefereeAccount

      public RefereeAccount(int id, String emailAddress, String password)

  • Method Details

    • getReferee

      public Referee getReferee(Connection connection)
      Retrieves the referee from the database that is associated with the instance of the referee using the user id of the account and returns the referee.

    • matchToResult

      public Match matchToResult(Connection connection, Match match, int homeScore, int awayScore)
      Updates information in the matches table so that the match can be recognised as a result rather than a fixture, as well as automatically deciding the outcome of the match using the score.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection to the database.
      match - The match which is being updated in order to register as a result.
      homeScore - Score for the home team.
      awayScore - Score for the away team.
      Returns:
      Returns the match as the completed version and any match events that were part of that match

    • recordMatchEvents

      public void recordMatchEvents(Connection connection, List<MatchEvent> matchEvents, Match match)
      Takes a list of match events and uses the instances to add them to the database.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection to the database permitting interaction with it.
      matchEvents - The list of events that occurred in the match being added to the database.
      match - The match that is having the event added to it.

    • matchEventDialog

      public MatchEvent matchEventDialog(JfgpWindow frame, Match match)
      Generates the dialog box to add the details of the match event and returns the instance of match event that has been created using the dialog box. This can then be used when adding the match and match events to the database upon recording the match.
      Parameters:
      frame - The main window holding the database and account information.
      match - The match that is having the event added to it.
      Returns:
      Shows the user the JDialog that permits recording the events.
